The Legend of Lobodestroyo vs. La Liga de Los Villanos

name: The Legend of Lobodestroyo vs. La Liga de Los Villanos
summary: The Legend of Lobodestroyo vs. La Liga de Los Villanos, or just "Lobodestroyo" for short, is a 3D platformer starring a luchadore wolf.
